description:
Mikagura Komari is a member of the Tsukiyono Company, a mercenary agency consisting of bunny girls willing to take on any assignment.
She is a character in the We are the Tsukiyono Company (Kochira Tsukiyono Company こちら月夜野♡カンパニ〜) television show that http://anidb.net/ch120646 [Kitagawa Marin] introduced to http://anidb.net/ch120645 [Gojou Wakana].
name: Mikagura Komari
